entry.title: WIND WARNING , North Cape
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:39 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Cape 09:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023
Temperature: -1.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 100 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -1.1°C
Wind: ESE 56 km/h gust 70 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Rain or snow. High 8.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with ice pellets and freezing rain changing to rain this morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 60 gusting to 100 this morning. High 8. Forecast issued 08:24 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Showers. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Showers ending late this evening then partly cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 08:24 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 08:24 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 11 except minus 16 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: Clearing. Low minus 11 except minus 16 in low lying areas. Forecast issued 08:24 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 2. Forecast issued 08:24 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023
